DOC.brief_summary: Life style intervention promote exercise healthy diet , potential improve health-related quality life ( HRQOL ) , may particularly appropriate cancer survivor . The previous study suggest key strategy implement sustainable healthy behavior improve health provide appropriate feedback promote self-efficacy . Web-based program enables provide feedback timely manner daily basis , continue healthy behavior . Therefore , investigator develop web-based , stage-matched Exercise Diet Planning program , whether program promote significantly great change behavioral outcome [ goal exercise ( energy expenditure aerobic exercise ≥ 12.5 kcal/kg/week ) diet ( intake vegetable ≥ 5 serv/day intake fruit ≥ 1 serv/day ) ] , stage change exercise diet , psychosocial outcome ( HRQOL , fatigue , anxiety depression ) self-efficacy implement goal exercise diet among breast cancer survivor Korea examine . Hypotheses follow : 1 . Survivors group participate web-based , stage-matched Exercise Diet Planning program ( hereinafter call 'intervention group ' ) show advanced stage change exercise diet compare survivor control group . 2 . The intervention group show high proportion attain goal exercise ( high level energy expenditure aerobic exercise ) compare control group . 3 . The intervention group show high proportion attain goal diet ( high level diet quality ) compare control group . 4 . The intervention group show good HRQOL level compare control group . 5 . The intervention group show good self-efficacy level compare control group . 6 . The intervention group show low fatigue level compare control group . 7 . The intervention group show less anxiety compare control group . 8 . The intervention group show less depression compare control group .
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study develop web-based , stage-matched Exercise Diet Planning program examine effect program implementation exercise diet , self-efficacy , HRQOL , fatigue , anxiety depression among breast cancer survivor . All participant recruit two tertiary university hospital National Cancer Center Korea .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Women age 20 year old 2 . Histologically confirm stage 0 III breast cancer receive curative breast cancer surgery within 12 month since completion primary cancer treatment 2 year since diagnosis 3 . Serum platelet ≥ 100,000/mm3 4 . Serum hemoglobin ≥ 10g/dl 5 . Not meet one behavior goal : ) energy expenditure aerobic exercise ≥ 12.5 kcal/kg/week ; ii ) intake vegetable except kimchi ≥ 5 serv/day intake fruit 12 serv/day ; iii ) maintenance healthy weight ( 18.5 kg/m2 ≤ BMI < 23 kg/m2 ) 6 . Ability use internet , accessible internet home 7 . Mobile phone user 8 . Consent form participate study 1 . Currently receive cancer treatment 2 . Conditions could limit adherence unsupervised exercise program uncontrolled congestive heart failure angina , recent myocardial infarction , breathe difficulty require oxygen use hospitalization ; walker wheelchair use ; plan hip knee replacement 3 . Conditions could interfere high vegetable fruit diet , kidney failure chronic warfarin use 4 . Progressive malignant disease additional primary cancer 5 . Infectious condition ( body temperature ≥ 37.2℃ WBC ≥ 11,000mm3 ) 6 . Inability use computer internet 7 . Visual motor dysfunction
